0.description: default ending for when we're not sure what kind of noun it is

1.description: rule set for neuter nouns ending in о, like слово

-1.description: rule set for neuter nouns ending in ко, like яблоко, or плечо

-1.1.description: rule set for neuter nouns ending in чко, like яблочко

2.description: rule set for neuter nouns ending in ое, like существительное

3.description: rule set for neuter nouns ending in е, like море

5.description: rule set for neuters ending in ие, like создание

6.description: rule set for female nouns ending in ия, like партия

7.description: rule set for female nouns ending in VCя, no example known just curious

-7.description: rule set for female nouns ending in consonant + я, like деревня

8.description: rule set for fleeting vowel female nouns ending in а, like кошка

9.description: rule set for female nouns ending in а, like сила

10.description: rule set for female nouns ending in ь, like помощь

11.description: rule set for male nouns ending in й, like чёрный

12.description: rule set for male nouns ending in ь, like писатель

13.description: rule set for male nouns ending in a regular consonant like стол

14.description: rule set for male nouns ending in a husher, like падеж

15.description: rule set for male nouns with plurals ending in а, like город

-15.description: rule set for male nouns with plurals ending in я, like якорь

16.description: rule set for fleeting vowel male nouns

17.description: rule set for hard, male adjectives

18.description: rule set for hard, female adjectives

19.description: rule set for hard, neuter adjectives

20.description: rule set for soft, male adjectives

21.description: rule set for soft, female adjectives

22.description: rule set for soft, neuter adjectives

23.description: rule set for male possessive adjectives, like мой

24.description: rule set for female possessive adjectives, like моя

25.description: rule set for neuter possessive adjectives, like мое

26.description: rule set for male possessive adjectives, like наш

27.description: rule set for female possessive adjectives, like наша

28.description: rule set for neuter possessive adjectives, like наше

29.description: rule set for male demonstrative adjectives, like этот

29.5.description: rule set for neuter demonstrative adjectives, like это

30.description: rule set for female demonstrative adjectives, like эта

31.description: rule set for neuter nouns ending in мя

32.description: rule set for male nouns with soft plurals

33.description: rule set for neuter nouns taking ья in plural

34.description: rule set for male nouns taking ья in plural

37.description: rule set for female nouns like мать and дочь

38.description: rule set for male nouns ending in -ин, like гражданин
